lst.name: sentence
lst.str: "There is some hope among investors that there will some progress in the status hearing tomorrow on the patent infringement suit with Kodak," analyst Michael Ellmann of Wertheim and Co said.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Rumors that New York investor Asher Edelman has acquired a stake in Polaroid Corp and optimism about tomorrow's status hearing on the patent infringement suit pending with Eastman Kodak Co <EK> sent Polaroid's stock higher, traders said.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: "Speculation that Edelman was going to take a stake in Polaroid was kicking around a few months ago, and resurfaced today," one trader said.

lst.name: sentence
